annotations.description: Default HTTPS keystore (keystore.jks) with name 'jboss' and password 'mykeystorepass' and JGoups keystore (jgroups.jceks) with name 'secret-key' and password 'password'
Route for KIE server's http service.
Route for Decision Central's http service.
Route for KIE server's https service.
Route for Decision Central's https service.
The broker's console and Jolokia port.
All the KIE server web server's ports.
All the Decision Central web server's ports.

parameters.name: POSTGRESQL_MEMORY_LIMIT
parameters.description: Database maximum amount of memory the container can use.

parameters.name: NAMESPACE
parameters.description: The OpenShift Namespace where the ImageStream resides.

parameters.name: DATABASE_SERVICE_NAME
parameters.description: The name of the OpenShift Service exposed for the database.

parameters.name: POSTGRESQL_USER
parameters.description: Username for PostgreSQL user that will be used for accessing the database.

parameters.name: POSTGRESQL_PASSWORD
parameters.description: Password for the PostgreSQL connection user.

parameters.name: POSTGRESQL_DATABASE
parameters.description: Name of the PostgreSQL database accessed.

parameters.name: DATABASE_VOLUME_CAPACITY
parameters.description: Database volume space available for data, e.g. 512Mi, 2Gi.

parameters.name: POSTGRESQL_VERSION
parameters.description: Version of PostgreSQL image to be used.
